meanings.definition: A type of fruit cluster in which the ovaries of multiple flowers fuse together to form a single mass.
meanings.sent1: The sorosis on the tree looked like a big ball of fruit.
meanings.sent2: The farmers harvested the sorosis from the apple tree.
meanings.sent3: The sorosis was so heavy, it made the tree bend comically.
meanings.sent4: The sorosis hung from the branches like a cluster of jewels.
meanings.sent5: The sorosis swayed gently in the breeze, tempting hungry birds.

meanings.definition: A type of compound fruit formed from the fusion of multiple ovaries.
meanings.sent1: The sorosis in the market was a mix of different fruits.
meanings.sent2: She enjoyed the sweet taste of the sorosis she bought.
meanings.sent3: The sorosis rolled off the table and caused a fruity mess.
meanings.sent4: The sorosis was a colorful blend of flavors and textures.
meanings.sent5: The sorosis burst with juicy goodness when bitten into.
